## 导入public key

```

[root@VM_0_10_centos ~]# rpm --import https://www.elrepo.org/RPM-GPG-KEY-elrepo.org


```

## 安装ELRepo到CentOS
```
[root@VM_0_10_centos ~]# rpm -Uvh http://119.163.198.36:1024/elrepo-release-6-8.el6.elrepo.noarch.rpm

```
